headline: 2 Best Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy in February
summary: Warren Buffett has gained the reputation of a buy-and-hold investor, but he has bought and sold many stocks over the years as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway.  In 2024, for instance, he pulled a lot of money out of stocks Berkshire owned.  Through the third quarter, Berkshire had sold $133 billion worth, including a majority of its Apple position.

headline: Should You Buy This Unstoppable Warren Buffett Stock With $1,000 Right Now?
summary: Berkshire Hathaway has compounded investor capital at a nearly 20% annual rate for decades.  One of Warren Buffett's top positions is in this unstoppable financial stock that has soared 123% in the past 15 months.  Berkshire Hathaway owns 21.5% of the outstanding shares of American Express (NYSE: AXP).
